messages.content: What does DTAIComfyVariables provide for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client?
DTAIComfyVariables provides variable nodes and shared global variables for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
Is DTAIComfyVariables a mandatory add-on for Comfy UI?
No, DTAIComfyVariables is an optional add-on to the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
What improvements does DTAIComfyVariables bring to Comfy UI?
DTAIComfyVariables introduces quality of life improvements to Comfy UI by providing variable nodes and shared global variables.
How can you start using DTAIComfyVariables in your Comfy UI client?
To start using DTAIComfyVariables, you need to import it into the custom nodes directory of your Comfy UI client.
What is the only dependency for DTAIComfyVariables?
The only dependency for DTAIComfyVariables is ComfyUI.
Under which license is DTAIComfyVariables distributed?
DTAIComfyVariables is distributed under the MIT License.
No, DTAIComfyVariables is not a standalone application. It is an add-on to the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
